Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

returns._1: Is position exist (may not exist due to region cavities)
Ring positions length (array is initialized 6 * radius, however not all values should be used)

params.chanceForTileWithBonus: Chance for tile with bonus (in 1e18 precision)

includeRegion(uint64,uint64).details: In case if there is more than zero regions in the game caller must provide two neighboring positions: first for new region, second of already existing regionIn case if zero included regions -> second param is ignored

init(address).details: Called by address which created current instance

isRegionIncluded(uint64).details: Used to determine whether region can be activated or not

includedRegions.details: Values are stored each time region is included and used in #isRegionIncluded

regionTiers.details: Values are stored each time region is included and used in #getRegionTier in order to persists tiers between eras

CannotIncludeAlreadyIncludedRegion().notice: Thrown when attempting to include already included region

CannotIncludeRegionDueToInsufficientUser.notice: Thrown when attempting to include region with insufficient amount of user settlements in neighboring region

CannotIncludeRegionDueToInsufficientValu.notice: Thrown when attempting to include region with insufficient value sent (only if world.erc20ForRegionInclusion == address(0), which is equivalent of native token)

CannotIncludeRegionWithInvalidRegionIncl.notice: Thrown when attempting to include region by providing invalid region inclusion proof

FirstRegionCanOnlyBeIncludedByMightyCrea.notice: Thrown when attempting to include first region by non mighty creator address

InvalidNeighborDirectionSpecified().notice: Thrown when attempting to _getNeighborPosition with invalid neighbor direction. It should not be thrown ever, if it does this will indicate logic error

InvalidTileBonusConfiguration().notice: Thrown when attempting to calculate tile bonus. It should not be thrown ever, if it does this will indicate logic error

OnlyActiveGame().notice: Thrown when attempting to call action which can only be called in active game (started and not finished)

ReentrantCall().notice: Thrown when attempting to call function via reentrancy

getRingPositions(uint64,uint256).notice: Calculates all ring positions by provided position and radius

getTileBonus(bytes32,uint256,uint64).notice: Returns tile bonus by provided position

includeRegion(uint64,uint64).notice: Includes new region to the game

isRegionIncluded(uint64).notice: Checks if region is included to the game
